testsuite.name: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases

testcase.name: The sum of all principal amounts in the schedule entries equals the total loan amount
The remaining outstanding principal of the last schedule entry equals always 0.00 €
testcase.system-err: expected:<0.0> but was:<0.01> com.lendico.assignment.stepdefinition.GeneratePlanTestCases.validateRemainingOutstandingPrincipal(GeneratePlanTestCases.java:63) ✽.validate "0.00" of the last schedule entry equals always 0.00(src/test/resources/FeatureFile/generatePlan.feature:19)

testcase.name: The start date determines the first due date of the calculated schedule. We assume
The remaining outstanding principal of one entry equals the initial outstanding
The total payment amount per month in a borrower schedule should equal the value
